cards.name: The Fool
cards.description: New beginnings, optimism, trust in life

cards.name: The Empress
cards.description: Abundance, nurturing, fertility, life in bloom!

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.description: Institutions, tradition, society and its rules

cards.name: Strength
cards.description: Courage, subtle power, integration of animal self

cards.name: Death
cards.description: The end of something, change, letting go

cards.name: The Devil
cards.description: Destructive patterns, addiction, giving away your power

cards.name: The Tower
cards.description: Collapse of stable structures, relase, sudden insight

cards.name: The Sun
cards.description: Success happiness, all will be will

cards.name: Judgement
cards.description: Rebirth, a new phase, inner calling

cards.name: The World
cards.description: Completion, wholeness, attainment, celebration of life

cards.name: 1 of Pentacles
cards.description: Financial reward, clarify of life purpose

cards.name: 3 of Pentacles
cards.description: Meaningful work, enjoying one's work, suitable career

cards.name: 4 of Pentacles
cards.description: Hoarding, feeling poor, holding self back out of fear

cards.name: 5 of Pentacles
cards.description: Minor money troubles, health issues, feeling like an outsider

cards.name: 7 of Pentacles
cards.description: Patience, waiting for your plans to bear fruit

cards.name: 8 of Pentacles
cards.description: Hard work, focused efforts, laying the groundwork

cards.name: 9 of Pentacles
cards.description: Luxury, rest, financial and material comforts

cards.name: 1 of Swords
cards.description: Fresh start, sudden opportunity, idea clarity

cards.name: 6 of Swords
cards.description: Leaving, accepting help, going somewhere better

cards.name: 4 of Cups
cards.description: Boredom, dissatisfaction with what is being offered

cards.name: 5 of Cups
cards.description: Dwelling on the negative, self pity

cards.name: 7 of Cups
cards.description: So many choices! Indecision, getting lost in fantasy

cards.name: 8 of Cups
cards.description: Abandoning something in search of something better

cards.name: 1 of Wands
cards.description: New beginnings, creative spark, fertile ideas

cards.name: 3 of Wands
cards.description: Reaping the rewards of your efforts

cards.name: 9 of Wands
cards.description: Pessimism, gearing up for the worst

cards.name: 10 of Wands
cards.description: Feeling oppressed, exhaustion, too many responsibilities

cards.name: King of Pentacles
cards.description: Enjoys the good life (food, drink and leisure), financially secure

cards.name: Queen of  Pentacles
cards.description: Healthy in body and finances, grounded and calm

cards.name: Knight of  Pentacles
cards.description: Cautious, sensible and slow to progress

cards.name: King of Swords
cards.description: Serious, controlling, rational and mind/intellect focused

cards.name: Queen of  Swords
cards.description: Intelligent, writer, communicative yet cold - cuts through B.S

cards.name: Page of  Swords
cards.description: Mentally unstable or intellectually immature, acts without thinking

cards.name: King of Cups
cards.description: Need to acknowledge deep feelings, avoid drowning out emotions

cards.name: Queen of Wands
cards.description: Confidant, focused, has zest for life

cards.name: Knight of Wands
cards.description: An adventurous risk taker who follows his passions

cards.name: Page of Wands
cards.description: Newly inspired, excited about life and work
